short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension will place a chat window for the class below a stream on Canvas.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extends the functionality of any canvas video stream by adding the dedicated class chat to the same page as the stream itself. This makes it easier to follow the content of the actual stream, stay involved in the chat, and reduce the potential for missing pings.
